metadata.note: Subset of 20 SciFact statements for evaluation experiments

queries.query: 0-dimensional biomaterials lack inductive properties.
1 in 5 million in UK have abnormal PrP positivity.
10% of sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS) deaths happen in newborns aged less than 6 months.
32% of liver transplantation programs required patients to discontinue methadone treatment in 2001.
Activated T cells have increased glucose uptake.
Anthrax spores remain active for decades.
Autophagy contributes to the pathogenesis of influenza A virus.
B cells undergo class switch recombination in the germinal center.
Cancer cells can acquire resistance to apoptosis.
CRISPR-Cas9 can edit genes in human embryos.
DNA methylation is essential for normal development.
Exercise increases BDNF expression in the brain.
Hepatitis B vaccine prevents liver cancer.
Influenza vaccination reduces cardiovascular events.
Metformin reduces cancer risk in diabetic patients.
MicroRNAs regulate gene expression post-transcriptionally.
Oxidative stress contributes to aging.
P53 is a tumor suppressor protein.
Statins reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease.
Vitamin D deficiency is associated with increased infection risk.
